channel.title: Zong-Yan Liu (Thomas) | Bioit Station (BITS) | Academia Sinica

item.title: Birthday Party
item.description:
This week marks Dr. Tsai’s birthday. Despite the fact that we are suffering from the pandemic, we are thrilled to be able to celebrate with our collaborator, Dr. Leu, and his lab members. May this day be filled with every unique enjoyment for you, and may the year offer all the wonderful things you are looking forward to.

Wishing you a beautiful day with good health and happiness forever. Happy Birthday!

item.title: Welcome Our New Research Assistants
item.description:
Under COVID-19 pandemic, we still have three research assistants joining our laboratory!

Welcome Zong-Yan Liu (Thomas), Kai-Li Chang, Ru-Yin Jian!

Let’s start dreaming big and making our dreams come true this year!
